page: MI60043: Rock Cutting And Rock Fragmentation

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: General theories of rock cutting, Design of cutting tools for optimum penetration and wear characteristics, Mechanics of Rotary and percussive drilling, Mechanics of coal cutting tools, Drillability and machinability characteristics of rocks. Advances in rock cutting techniques. Mechanics of rock breakage in blasting. Design of blasting.
